sentences.literal: Shang Zhang Zhi Qiao sixth year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘三十五，小餘八百八十九；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder thirty five, small remainder eight hundred eighty nine;
Large remainder thirty seven, small remainder sixteen;

sentences.chinese: 焉逢涒灘元平元年十二大餘三十，小餘二百九十七；
sentences.literal: Yanfeng Dun Tan Yuan Ping first year twelve large remainder thirty, small remainder two hundred ninety seven;

sentences.chinese: 大餘四十二，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder forty two, small remainder twenty four;
Duameng Zuo E Ben Shi first year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘二十四，小餘六百四十五；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder twenty four, small remainder six hundred forty five;
Large remainder forty eight, no small remainder;
You Zhao Yan Mao second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘四十八，小餘五百五十二；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder forty eight, small remainder five hundred fifty two;
Large remainder fifty three, small remainder eight;
Qiang Wu Da Yuan Xian third year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘四十二，小餘九百；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder forty two, small remainder nine hundred;
Large remainder fifty eight, small remainder sixteen;
Tu Wei Kun Dun fourth year.
